Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: children's play equipment, A3 and A4 photocopier, talking books, videos, DVDs, language tapes, local newspapers and children's magazines. Meeting room available for hire. Activities include Story Time and Councillors' surgeries. Provides 5 People's Network computers (2 dedicated for use by children) with Microsoft Office, internet access and printer available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Wed 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); 3rd Sat in the month 10-11.30am (Councillor's surgery)
